events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-03-30, resulting in damages to their vehicle and minor injuries.
After reviewing the initial report, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of a personal vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly, ensuring all aspects of the vehicle accident are thoroughly reviewed.
The customer was formally notified that their vehicle accident claim has been acknowledged and is now under review by the insurance company.
To progress the claim, the customer was requested to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and copies of the police collision report.
The required documents including photos of the accident scene and collision report were submitted by the customer within the requested timeframe.
An internal investigation was initiated to verify the facts around the car accident and assess the damage to the customer’s vehicle.
The investigation confirmed the details submitted and determined the liability, including reviewing the collision circumstances and police statements.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs for the damaged vehicle as well as compensation for minor injuries sustained.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the amount offered and the timely communication.
Following acceptance of the settlement offer, the claim was officially approved by the insurance company to proceed with payment.
The payment for the vehicle repairs and medical reimbursements was successfully issued to the customer’s account.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following completion of payment and final customer approval of the resolution.
All documentation and case materials related to the car collision claim have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
